articles.title: A scan of 10.3 million stars turns up no sign of aliens - yet - TODAYonline
articles.description: WASHINGTON - Scientists have completed the broadest search to date for extraterrestrial civilizations by scanning roughly 10.3 million stars using a radio telescope in Australia, but have found nothing - not yet, at least.
